alert.note: Alert for Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 2:23PM CST until December 02 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CST FOR THOMAS AND RAWLINS COUNTIES... At 222 PM CST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Herndon to 9 miles southeast of Ludell to 7 miles southeast of Brewster, moving southeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 36 and 74. This dust channel will be near... Rexford around 235 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this dust channel include Blakeman, Beardsley, Mingo and Halford. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.
